title: `FocusManager` in Action
subtitle: Key methods for interacting with the focus tree.

leftBullets.title: `requestFocus(FocusNode node)`
leftBullets.description: The primary way to programmatically set focus. Use this to jump focus anywhere in the tree.

leftBullets.title: `primaryFocus` (getter)
leftBullets.description: Lets you find out which node in the entire application currently has focus. Great for debugging.

leftBullets.title: `addKeyEventCallback()`
leftBullets.description: A powerful hook to listen to ALL key events globally, before they are sent to the focused widget.

leftBullets.title: `removeKeyEventCallback()`
leftBullets.description: Always remember to remove your callback when it's no longer needed to prevent memory leaks.
